title: Paula Deen's Banana Pudding
ingredients: 5 oz box instant French vanilla pudding mix
instructions: Line bottom of 13 x 9 x 2 inch dish with 1 bag of cookies & layer bananas on top. In a bowl, combine milk & pudding mix & blend well using handheld mixer. Using another bowl, combine cream cheese & condensed milk together & mix until smooth. Fold whipped topping into cream cheese. Add cream cheese mixture to pudding mixture & stir until well blended. Pour mixture over cookies & bananas & cover with remaining cookies. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
